title: Deep learning methods for tuberculosis diagnosis from chest radiographs

title: Benchmarking Self-Supervised Methods for Accelerated MRI Reconstruction
details: A Wang, M Davies - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.14009, 2025
abstract: Reconstructing MRI from highly undersampled measurements is crucial for accelerating medical imaging, but is challenging due to the ill-posedness of the inverse problem. While supervised deep learning approaches have shown …
